name: The Christian Esoteric (IAPSOP)
content:
The Christian Esoteric (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Bible Review Summary: From Pat Deveney's database: Christian Esoteric, The. 1926-1943 Applegate, CA. Publisher: Esoteric Publishing Co.. Editor: Hiram Erastus Butler. Succeeds: The Esoteric -> Occult and Biological Journal -> The Bible Review 1/1, 1926 (also called 33/1)-1943. The journal continues the numbering and purposes of Butler's other publications: The Bible Review, Occult and Biological Journal, and The Esoteric. NYPL; LOC. Should be read in context with The Esoteric, The Occult and Biological Journal, and The Bible Review, which are all Society Esoteric/Esoteric Fraternity publications. Issues:Christian Esoteric, October 1936 Christian Esoteric, November 1937 Christian Esoteric, December 1937 Christian Esoteric, January 1938 Christian Esoteric, March 1938 Christian Esoteric, April 1938 Christian Esoteric, May 1938 Christian Esoteric, June 1938 Christian Esoteric, July 1938 Christian Esoteric, August 1938 Christian Esoteric, November 1938 Christian Esoteric, December 1938 Christian Esoteric, February 1939 Christian Esoteric, September 1942 Christian Esoteric, January 1943
